quests.name: Escape Claws
objectives: Examine the door to the Laugh Floor.
Search for something to disguise yourself as a monster.

Open the bag of Monstrous Accessories.
  ‧ Put on your Monsters, Inc. Hard Hat once your disguise is complete.
  ‧ Put on your choice of Monstrous Ears.
(Optional) Experiment with Fantasy Skin Tones and Contact Lenses in the Wardrobe Menu to create a Monstrous Disguise.
Take a selfie only once you're happy with your new Monstrous Disguise.
Unlock the door to the Laugh Floor in your Monstrous Disguise.

Clean the Laugh Floor.
  ‧ 4 Slug Slime Puddles
  ‧ 8 Party Trash
Listen to Mike and Sulley talk.

Use the coffee station to cook:
  ‧ The Wazowski Special.
  ‧ Sulley's Coffee.
Make sure you have Mike and Sulley's coffees in your Inventory.
Bring the coffees to Mike Wazowski.
Bring the Emergency Manual to Sulley.

Find and replace the fuses and correct the power flow to rescue Mike.
  ‧ 3 Electrical Panel
  ‧ 10 Power Lines
